text: '#PEPP must be attractive to consuers and there must be trust. That’s why we rely on EIOPA to apply a European label to this product. We believe #EIOPA is well-placed to do this.' Martin Merlin @EU_Finance #EIOPAconference
#PEPP must be a true retirement product. Must be sure that you are given back your savings over time. Xavier Larnaudie-Eiffel @CNP_Assurances #EIOPAconference
‘Trust is most important point in #PEPP and EIOPA must stand by this guarantee.’ @CGuerlich @BdVev #EIOPAconference
Consumers in all EU Member States face the same problems with regard to retirement provision. @CGuelich #EIOPAconference
As a consumer, you need reliable, trusted and understandable information. @SophieintVeld #EIOPAconference
RT @CNP_Assurances: @eiopa_europa_eu @SophieintVeld @Better_Finance @EU_Commission @blackrock #EIOPAconference Xavier Larnaudie-Eiffel : "P…
Pension systems that work and that are affordable over the long run are essential for a stable economy. Martin Merlin @EU_Finance #EIOPAconference
#PEPP part of wider solution to solving Europe's pension gap. Martin Parkes @blackrock #EIOPAconference
#PEPP must be simple, transparent and cost effective. @CGuelich #EIOPAconference

‘Trust is key for PEPP. Nothing will happen if people don’t buy PEPP. People must trust that is is a safe product that gives them good returns and is managed properly.’ Xavier Larnaudie-Eiffel from @CNP_Assurances #EIOPAconference

#PEPP is high on the agenda this afternoon with @CGuerlich from @BdVev, @SophieintVeld, Xavier Larnaudie-Eiffel from @CNP_Assurances, Martin Merlin from @EU_Finance and Martin Parkes @blackrock. #EIOPAconference https://t.co/N3CmJTsFlV
#PEPP must be technically smart and trusted, by both customers and providers. If it is not trusted, it will not work. @SophieintVeld #EIOPAconference
‘PEPP is not only good for European Union and eurozone, but also good for people That’s what we should remember.’ @SophieintVeld #EIOPAconference
#PEPP will allow us to expand a high-level of pension provision in the Member States,’ says @SophieintVeld #EIOPAconference https://t.co/i4P2frBs9G
#EIOPAconference https://t.co/CD22J6PVkT
‘Our first question is always is there a tech solution?’ @C_Oster1 @ClarkGermany #EIOPAconference
